DataElement.preferredDefinition: A congenital or acquired spinal deformity characterized by lateral curvature of the spine._A systemic evaluation of the body and its functions using visual inspection, palpation, percussion and auscultation. The purpose is to determine the presence or absence of physical signs of disease or abnormality for an individual's health assessment._a free text field to specify information on the evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A congenital or acquired spinal deformity characterized by lateral curvature of the spine._A systemic evaluation of the body and its functions using visual inspection, palpation, percussion and auscultation. The purpose is to determine the presence or absence of physical signs of disease or abnormality for an individual's health assessment.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A congenital or acquired spinal deformity characterized by lateral curvature of the spine.

Concepts.definition: A congenital or acquired spinal deformity characterized by lateral curvature of the spine.

Property.preferredDefinition: Examination of the body by auscultation, palpation, percussion, inspection, and olfaction.  (Taber's)

Concepts.definition: A systemic evaluation of the body and its functions using visual inspection, palpation, percussion and auscultation. The purpose is to determine the presence or absence of physical signs of disease or abnormality for an individual's health assessment.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Changed from caBIG to PhenX for PANH by script 2015-12-21

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: a free text field to specify information on the evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Text; the words of something written.
